data.name: Hellsweeper VR
data.description:
DARE TO DESCEND INTO HELL?

From the makers of Sairento VR comes a first person action-combat game that descends you into hell. In Hellsweeper VR you traverse the demonic dimensions, wield weapons with deadly precision, command the forces of telekinesis and muster mystical powers to wipe out your twisted enemies. Reap your rewards, upgrade your skills, and choose your fate as you experiment with unique combat variations and start to discover what being a Hellsweeper means to you.

• Intense limitless movement: A daring, no-holes-barred locomotion system that pushes the limits of even the bravest of VR players.
• Master your combat style: Summon, wield & master various weapons and magic combinations. 
• Survive in various game modes: Various singleplayer and co-op modes. Survive together, Die together. 
• Content-rich experience with high replayability: Conquer 18 maps, over 10 enemy types with elemental variants and multiple mission types, offering a unique gameplay experience with every run.

changelog.change_log:
Hi Hellsweepers, the Treachery Content Update is now live, just in time for the holidays! This update brings a new boss, weapon(s), the 3-Act Co-Op mode, endless roguelike mode, and a new blacksmith area where you can customize your loadout before your runs. We've also introduced fresh traits, blessings, and more. Check out the detailed update list below.

Stay tuned to our Discord for further updates. Your support and feedback mean the world to us. Thank you!

Hi Hellsweepers,

In this latest patch, we've got another long list of QoL, balance tweaks, and progression improvements lined up for you. Hate exploding enemies? They now drop bombs before detonating, providing you with a fairer shot at survival!

We've also fine-tuned hand offsets for a range of weapons like the bow, axe, shotgun, and rifle based on your invaluable input. Stay tuned on our Discord for sneak peeks on upcoming updates. As always, thank you for your support!

Hi Hellsweepers!

This big update covers bug fixes, overall balancing adjustments, QoL improvements, and more. We’re excited for you to experience these changes and would greatly appreciate your feedback.

Join the conversation on our Discord — We’d love to hear from you!

Hey Hellsweepers!

A massive thank you to each and every one of you for supporting Hellsweeper VR! It’s been a thrilling week since launch, and your feedback has been invaluable.

Our first patch contains a critical fix for the Co-op bug that prevented some players from inviting friends and receiving invites.

Keep the feedback coming, and above all – happy hell sweeping!

Crafted with Love,
